Posts.Content: Sandygirlcass wrote: Not sure where to post, but I am officially getting really nervous.  Have not had sleep in 5 days, trying to go to bed early so if I get up ( which I have every night) I can say I did get some. Having a stereotactic biopsy done tomorrow at noon.  43 Yrs of age - no children - Went through menopause at the ripe age of 24, was officially done by age 32.  Have calcifications in perfect cluster together on left breast.  Had 2 mammagrams done and just got the call for tomorrows appointment at noon. After reading everyone else on here.. thought I would brave up and write too.   Have always considered myself strong, but last 7 days, have felt very defeated... and I know I shouldn't because I have no results yet, but I just cant seem to shake it.  Any help on stereotactic procedure would be greatly appreciated. Concerned and sleepless Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Not sure where to post - stereotactic Sandygirlcass Chevfan
